thread.title: Chip Kelly, Philadelphia Eagles at Carolina Panthers (Sunday Night Football): Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Chip Kelly, Philadelphia Eagles at Carolina Panthers (Sunday Night Football): Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Chip Kelly, Philadelphia Eagles at Carolina Panthers (Sunday Night Football): Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
Chip Kelly and the Philadelphia Eagles, winners of two consecutive games, have taken advantage of the weak NFC East to move into first place. Remaining in that position will be tough when they travel south to face the undefeated Carolina Panthers in Sunday Night Football (KGW-8 (NBC), 5:25 p.m. PT/8:25 p.m. ET) .
The Eagles (3-3) have moved into the to spot in the NFC East behind tough defense and a resurgent running game. The Eagles defense has forced 16 turnovers, second in the NFL and they've allowed 18.3 points a game, sixth in the league.
The offense hasn't been as consistent, particularly quarterback Sam Bradford. He has thrown nine interceptions, tied for second in the NFL. Most glaring is his three interceptions in the end zone in the last two games.
The Panthers (5-0) are riding the high of beating Seattle, arguably their biggest regular season win in franchise history. Not only did they beat the two-time defending conference champions, they won by scoring the game-winning touchdown with 32 seconds remaining in Seattle, where the Seahawks rarely lose.
If you want to watch the Eagles take on the Panthers, here's what you need to know:
What : Philadelphia Eagles at Carolina Panthers
Where : Bank of American Stadium, Charlotte, NC
When : Sunday, Oct. 25, 5:25 p.m. PT/8:25 p.m. ET
TV : KGW-8 (NBC)
Watch online : You can watch the live stream online on DirecTV's live stream package
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
